question: The central government appointed whom as the interlocutor on its behalf to hold talks with the United Liberation Front of Assam (ULFA)?
explanation: The central government appointed AB Mathur as interlocutor on its behalf to hold talks with the United Liberation Front of Assam (ULFA). AB Mathur is an IPS officer of the 1975 batch. He is the former special secretary of the Research and Analysis Wing (RAW).
